bibl.title: A Survey of the Main Papyrus Texts of Post-Classical Tragedy.
bibl.note: A. Texts of Certain Authorship: 1. The Hector of Astydamas; - 2. Chaeremon's Centaur. - B. Texts of Uncertain Authorship: 1. Medea; - 2. Andromache; - 3. Phoenissae or Septem; - 4. The Asigmatic Atlas; - 5. The Gyges and Candaules Text; - 6. The Trojan Dialogue on Hector's Combat; - 7. Text with Musical Notation.
XANTHAKIS-KARAMANOS Georgia, A Survey of the Main Papyrus Texts of Post-Classical Tragedy.
Akten des 21. Internationalen Papyrologenkongresses = ArchPF. Beiheft 3. II (Stuttgart - Leipzig, 1997) pp. 1034-1048.
